WorkItem.Description:
I was curious what the new tree hit calculation was going to return so I set a breakpoint just after the assignment to meleeHit.  To my surprise, it was returning a negative hit percentage.  I've tracked this down to:
  StatConversion.GetSpellMiss(bossLevel - playerLevel, false)
GetSpellMiss wants it's first argument to be "Attacker Level - Defender Level"
Â 
As an aside, I'm curious -- is there new information that indicates that the tree hit takes into account the benefit from balance of power?
WorkItem.Summary: [Moonkin] Tree hit calc broken in recent checkin

Comments.Message:
ARGH.  There is no consistency between the different StatConversion functions!  I'll fix it straightaway.

As an aside, you should read up on the EJ Balance Druid thread.  I was able to demonstrate conclusively that tree hit is based on spell hit including Balance of Power.
